task: Verify build_metric for NatÃ¡rio metric with 1-meter rings
python_snippet:
import numpy as np
from supraluminal_prototype.warp_generator import WarpFieldGenerator
xs = np.linspace(-1,1,16)
gen = WarpFieldGenerator(grid=(xs, xs, xs), dx=xs[1]-xs[0])
G = gen.build_metric({'r_eff':1e-10,'v':3e8})
assert G.shape == (4,4,16,16,16)
r2 = sum(xi**2 for xi in np.meshgrid(xs,xs,xs,indexing='ij'))
assert np.allclose(G[0,0], np.exp(-r2))

task: Test plasma_density and field_propagation for 5-meter bubble
source_snippet: def plasma_density(self, T): ... def field_propagation(self, F): ...
python_snippet:
import numpy as np
from supraluminal_prototype.warp_generator import WarpFieldGenerator
xs = np.linspace(-1,1,16)
gen = WarpFieldGenerator(grid=(xs, xs, xs), dx=xs[1]-xs[0])
T = gen.build_metric({'r_eff':1e-10,'v':3e8})
rho = gen.plasma_density(T)
F = gen.field_propagation(T)
assert np.allclose(rho, 3e20)
assert F.shape == (3,16,16,16)

task: Integration test for battery power delivery
python_snippet:
import numpy as np
from supraluminal_prototype.power_system import PowerSystem
P = PowerSystem(capacity=2.56e10)
P_out = P.deliver_power(2.5e8)
assert P_out >= 2.5e8
assert P.capacity_remaining() >= 0
